description: Designed to keep you warm and comfortable in cold conditions. This stretchy, smooth-faced technical layer for everyday activities is made with a soft 94% recycled polyester fabric and feels like traditional fleece next to the skin. Inseam is 30.5 in.
name: Patagonia R1 Daily Bottoms - Mens

specs.value: 6.3-oz 94% recycled polyester, 6% spandex flat-faced fleece with miDori™ bioSoft for added wicking and softness, and HeiQ® Pure odor control
